lines.gurmukhi: 1 mMglw crx
lines.transliteration_english: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi ?

Shabad OS B.translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

lines.gurmukhi: Awid purK Awdysu hY siqgur scu nwau sdvwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Aadi Purakh Aadaysu Hai Satiguru Sachu Naau Sadavaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Salutation to that primal Lord who is known by the true name of Satigura.

lines.gurmukhi: cwir vrn gurisK kir gurmuiK scw pMQu clwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Chaari Varan Gurasikh Kari Guramoukhi Sachaa Pandu Chalaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Transforming all the four varnas into the Sikhs of the Guru, that true Guru (Gum Nanak Dev) has initiated a true way for the Gurmukhs.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq imil gwNvdy siqguru sbdu Anwhd vwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Mili Gaanvaday Satiguru Sabadu Anaahadu Vaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The true Guru has vibrated such an unstruck word which is sung in the holy congregation by one and all.

lines.gurmukhi: gur swKI aupdysu kir Awip qrY sYNswr qrwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Gur Saakhee Oupadaysu Kari Aapi Tarai Saisaaru Taraaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Gurmukhs recite the teachings of the Guru; they go across and make the world go across (the world ocean).

lines.gurmukhi: pwn supwrI kQu imil cUny rMgu surMgu cVHwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Paan Soupaaree Kadu Mili Choonay Rangu Surang Charhhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: As in betel leaf mixing of catechu, lime and betel nut makes a nice colour, similarly, gurmukh way of life consisting of all the four varnas is beautiful.

lines.gurmukhi: igAwnu iDAwnu ismrx jugiq gurmiq imil gur pUrw pwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Giaanu Dhiaanu Simarani Jougati Guramati Mili Gur Pooraa Paaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He, who having met the perfect Gum has attained Gurmati; the wisdom of the Guru, has in fact identified the teachnique of knowledge, concentration and meditation.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq scKMfu vswieAw ]1]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Sach Khandu Vasaaiaa ?1?

Shabad OS B.translation: The true Guru has established the abode of truth in the form of holy congregation.

lines.gurmukhi: 2 guru nwnk ny ikvyN bcwieAw

Shabad OS B.translation: The true Guru arranged the glimpse of the imperceptible     ?

lines.gurmukhi: pr qn pr Dn pr inMd myit nwmu dwnu iesnwnu idVwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Paratan Paradhan Paranid Mayti Naamu Daanu Isanaanu Dirhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Holding (me) back from other's body, wealth and slander, the true Guru, has made me resolute for the practice of meditation on Lord's name, ablution and charity.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmiq mnu smJwiekY bwhir jwNdw vrij rhwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Guramati Manu Samajhaai Kai Baahari Jaandaa Varaji Rahaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: People also making their minds understand through the teaching of the Gum have restrained it from going astray.

lines.gurmukhi: min ijqY jgu ijix lieAw AstDwqu iekDwqu krwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Mani Jitai Jagu Jini Laiaa Asat Dhaatu Ik Dhaatu Karaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: As the eight metals touching the philosopher's stone become gold, similarly, the gurmukhs, having conquered their mind have conquered the whole world.

lines.gurmukhi: pwrs hoey pwrshu gur aupdysu Avysu idKwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Paaras Hoay Paarasahu Gur Oupadaysu Avaysu Dikhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Such is the effect of the Guru's teaching that the Sikh acquires the same qualifies as if a stone by touching a philosopher's stone has itself become another philosopher's stone.

lines.gurmukhi: jog Bog ijix jugiq kir Bwie Bgiq BY Awpu gvwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Jog Bhog Jini Jougati Kari Bhaai Bhagati Bhai Aapu Gavaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Systematically, having won yoga as well as pleasures and getting immersed in devotion they have lost their fears.

lines.gurmukhi: Awpu gieAw Awip vriqAw Bgiq vCl hoie vsgiq AwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Aapu Gaiaa Aapi Varatiaa Bhagati Vachhal Hoi Vasagati Aaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: When the ego vanished, God was not only realized as diffused all around, but also because of love for His devotees

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq ivic AlKu lKwieAw ]2]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Vichi Alakhu Lakhaaiaa ?2?

Shabad OS B.translation: He came under their control.

lines.gurmukhi: 3 AswD siqgMg ny swDy

Shabad OS B.translation: Chronic ailments cured

lines.gurmukhi: sbd suriq imil swDsMig gurmuiK duK suK smkir swDy
lines.transliteration_english: Sabad Surati Mili Saadhasangi Guramoukhi Doukh Soukh Sam Kari Saadhay.

Shabad OS B.translation: In the holy congregation, getting attuned to the Word, the gurmukh treats pains and joys in the same vein.

lines.gurmukhi: haumY durmiq prhrI gurmiq siqgur purKu AwrwDy
lines.transliteration_english: Haoumai Duramati Paraharee Guramati Satigur Purakhu Aaraadhay.

Shabad OS B.translation: He renounces egotist ill thoughts and adopting the teachings of the true Guru adores the Timeless Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: isv skqI no lMiGkY gurmuiK suK Plu shj smwDy
lines.transliteration_english: Siv Sakatee No Laghi Kai Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Sahaj Samaadhay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Going beyond the phenomena of the Siva-Sakti (maya), the Gurnzukh calmly merges in the fruits of delight.

lines.gurmukhi: guru prmysru eyk jwix dUjw Bwau imtwie aupwDy
lines.transliteration_english: Guru Paramaysaru Ayku Jaani Doojaa Bhaau Mitaai Oupaadhay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Considering Guru and God as one, he decimates the ills of the sense of duality.

lines.gurmukhi: jMmx mrxhu bwhry Ajrwvir imil Agm AgwDy
lines.transliteration_english: Janman Maranahu Baaharay Ajaraavari Mili Agam Agaadhay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukhs go out of the cycle of transmigration and meeting that unapproachable and unfathomable Lord go away from the impacts of time (oldage).

lines.gurmukhi: Aws n qRws audws Gir hrK sog ivhu AMmiRq KwDy
lines.transliteration_english: Aas N Traas Udaas Ghari Harakh Sog Vihu Anmrit Khaadhay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Hopes and fears do not torture them. They reside in home while being detached and to them nectar or poison, happiness and sorrows are all the same.

lines.gurmukhi: mhw AswD swDsMg swDy ]3]
lines.transliteration_english: Mahaa Asaadh Saadhasang Saadhay ?3?

Shabad OS B.translation: In the holy congregation, the frightening chronic ailments are also cured.

lines.gurmukhi: 4 is`K krxI swD sMg

Shabad OS B.translation: Conduct of a Sikh

lines.gurmukhi: pauxu pwxI bYsMqro rj guxu qm guxu sq guxu ijqw
lines.transliteration_english: Paounu Paanee Baisantaro Raj Gounu Tam Gounu Sat Gounu Jitaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Air, water, fire and the three qualities – tranquillity, activity and inertness have been conquered by the Sikh.

lines.gurmukhi: mn bc krm sMklp kir iek min hoie ivgoie duicqw
lines.transliteration_english: Man Bach Karam Sankalap Kari Ik Mani Hoi Vigoi Douchitaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: With the concentration of mind, speech, action and meditating upon the One, he has lost the sense of duality.

lines.gurmukhi: lok vyd gur igAwn ilv AMdir ieku bwhir bhu iBqw
lines.transliteration_english: Lok Vayd Gur Giaan Liv Andari Iku Baahari Bahu Bhitaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Absorption in the knowledge of the Guru is his conduct in the world. In his innerself he is One (with the Lord) while he performs diverse duties in the world.

lines.gurmukhi: mwq lok pwqwl ijix surg lok ivic hoie AiQqw
lines.transliteration_english: Maat Lok Paataal Jini Surag Lok Vichi Hoi Aditaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Conquering the earth and the nether world he establishes himself in heavens.

lines.gurmukhi: imTw bolxu iniv clxu hQhu dy kir piqq pivqw
lines.transliteration_english: Mitdaa Bolanu Nivi Chalanu Hadahu Day Kari Patit Pavitaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: By speaking sweetly, behaving humbly and bestowing charities with one's own hands, even the fallen ones have become pure.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Plu pwieAw Aqulu Afol Amol Aimqw
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Paaiaa Atulu Adolu Amolu Amitaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Thus, the gurmukh attains incomparable and invalauable fruits of delight.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq imil pIiV nipqw ]4]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Mili Peerhi Napitaa ?4?

Shabad OS B.translation: Associating with the holy congregation he squeezes out the ego (from the mind).

lines.gurmukhi: 5 is`K gqI, swD sMg-cwr igxqI

Shabad OS B.translation: Successful transaction they do in the holy congregation ,  -

lines.gurmukhi: cwir pdwrQ hQ joiV hukmI bMdy rhin KVoqy
lines.transliteration_english: Chaari Padaarad Had Jorhi Houkamee Banday Rahani Kharhotay.

Shabad OS B.translation: The four ideals (dharma, arth, ktim, moks) stand w'th folded hands around the obedient servant (of the Lord).

lines.gurmukhi: cwry ck invwieAw pYrI pY iek sUiq proqy
lines.transliteration_english: Chaaray Chak Nivaaiaa Pairee Pai Ik Sooti Parotay.

Shabad OS B.translation: This servant has made the four directions bow to him by bowing to One who has strung one and all into one thread.

lines.gurmukhi: vyd n pwiein Bydu ikhu piV piV pMifq suix suix sRoqy
lines.transliteration_english: Vayd N Paaini Bhaydu Kihu Parhi Parhi Pandit Souni Souni Srotay.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Vedas, the reciter pandits of the Vedas and their audience cannot understand His mystery.

lines.gurmukhi: chu juig AMdr jwgdI Eiq poiq imil jgmg joqy
lines.transliteration_english: Chahu Jougi Andar Jaagadee Aoti Poti Mili Jagamag Jotay.

Shabad OS B.translation: His ever radiant flame glows in all the four yugso ages.

lines.gurmukhi: cwir vrn iek vrn hoie gurisK vVIAin gurmuiK goqy
lines.transliteration_english: Chaari Varan Ik Varan Hoi Gurasikh Varheeani Guramoukhi Gotay.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Sikhs of all the four vamas became one varna and they have entered the (larger) clan of Gurmukhs.

lines.gurmukhi: Drmswl ivic bIjdy kir gurpurb su vxj sEqy
lines.transliteration_english: Dharamasaal Vichi Beejaday Kari Gurapurab Su Vanaj Saaotay.

Shabad OS B.translation: They at the abodes of dharma (Gurdvaras) celebrate anniversaries of the Gurus and thus sow the seeds of virtuous actions.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq imil dwdy poqy ]5]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Mili Daaday Potay ?5?

Shabad OS B.translation: In the holy congregation the grandson and the grandfather (i.e. young and old) are equal to each other.

lines.gurmukhi: 6 gurBweI swD sMg-pMj igxqI

Shabad OS B.translation: Holy congregation is adorned by the fellow disciples  -

lines.gurmukhi: kwm kRoDu AhMkwru swiD loB moh dI joh imtweI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaam Krodhu Ahankaar Saadhi Lobh Moh Dee Joh Mitaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Sikhs in sadh sangat (holy company) controlling the kam (lust) krodh (anger), ahatilair ego), decimate their greed and infatuation.

lines.gurmukhi: squ sMqoK dieAw Drmu ArQu smrQu sugrQu smweI
lines.transliteration_english: Satu Santokhu Daiaa Dharamu Aradu Samaradu Sougaradu Samaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: In the holy congregation, truth contentment, compassion, dharma, wealth, power all are subsumed.

lines.gurmukhi: pMjy qq aulMiGAw pMij sbd vjI vwDweI
lines.transliteration_english: Panjay Tat Ulaghiaa Panji Sabad Vajee Vaadhaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Crossing the five elements, the felicitation of the five words (instruments) are. played there.

lines.gurmukhi: pMjy mudRw vis kir pMcwiexu huie dys duhweI
lines.transliteration_english: Panjay Mudraa Vasi Kari Panchaainu Hui Days Duhaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Having controlled five yogic postures, the respectable member of the congregation become famous all around.

lines.gurmukhi: prmysr hY pMj imil lyK AlyK n kImiq pweI
lines.transliteration_english: Paramaysar Hai Panj Mili Laykh Alaykh N Keemati Paaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Where the five persons sit together, Lord God, is there; this mystery of indescribable Lord cannot be known.

lines.gurmukhi: pMj imly prpMc qij Anhd sbd sbid ilv lweI
lines.transliteration_english: Panj Milay Parapanch Taji Anahad Sabad Sabadi Liv Laaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: But only those five meet (to sit together) who repudiating hypocrisy have merged their consciousness in the unstruck melody of the Word.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq sohin gur BweI ]6]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Sohani Gur Bhaaee ?6?

Shabad OS B.translation: Such fellow-disciples adome the holy congregation.

lines.gurmukhi: 7 gurmuK, swD sMg-Cy igxqI

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukh, association with the saints  count of six),  -

lines.gurmukhi: iCA drsn qrsix Gxy gurmuiK siqguru drsnu pwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Chhia Darasan Tarasani Ghanay Guramoukhi Satiguru Darasanu Paaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Followers of six (Indian. philosophies) crave intensely but only gurmukh gets the glimpse of the Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: iCA swsqR smJwvxI gurmuiK guru aupdysu idVwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Chhia Saasatr Samajhaavanee Guramoukhi Guru Oupadaysu Dirhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The six Shastras make one understand in a round about manner but gurmukhs make the teachings of the Guru firmly lodged in the heart.

lines.gurmukhi: rwg nwd ivsmwd ivic gurmiq siqgur sbdu suxwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Raag Naad Visamaad Vichi Guramati Satigur Sabadu Sounaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: All the musical measures and melodies are wonder-struck to feel that

lines.gurmukhi: iCA ruqI kir vrqmwn sUrju ieku clqu vrqwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Chhia Routee Kari Varatamaan Sooraju Iku Chalatu Varataaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The true Guru is such as the one sun remains stabilized in all the six seasons.

lines.gurmukhi: iCA rs swau n pwienI gurmuiK suKu Plu iprm cKwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Chhia Ras Saau N Paainee Guramoukhi Soukhu Phalu Piramu Chakhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Such a pleasure-fruit has been attained by Gurmukhs, the taste of which could not be known by six pleasures.

lines.gurmukhi: jqI sqI icru jIvxy ckÍriq hoie mohy mwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Jatee Satee Chiru Jeevanay Chakravarati Hoi Mohay Maaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Anchorites, followers of truth, long lived ones and universally acclaimed ones are all engrossed in delusions.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq imil shij smwieAw ]7]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Mili Sahaji Samaaiaa ?7?

Shabad OS B.translation: Only joining the holy congregation, one could be absorbed in one's innate nature.

lines.gurmukhi: 8 Sbd kmweI, swD sMg-s`q igxqI

Shabad OS B.translation: Discipline of Word, association with saints  the count of seven ,  -

lines.gurmukhi: sq smuMd smwie lY Bvjl AMdir rhy inrwlw
lines.transliteration_english: Sat Samound Samaai Lai Bhavajal Andari Rahay Niraalaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukhs moving in the holy congregation and having controlled the seven seas remain detached in this world ocean.

lines.gurmukhi: sqy dIp AnHyru hY gurmuiK dIpku sbd aujwlw
lines.transliteration_english: Satay Deep Anhayr Hai Guramoukhi Deepaku Sabad Ujaalaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: All the seven continents are in darkness; gurmukh enlightener them by lamp of Word.

lines.gurmukhi: sqy purIAw soDIAw shj purI scI DRmswlw
lines.transliteration_english: Satay Pureeaa Sodheeaa Sahaj Puree Sachee Dharamasaalaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The gurmukh has reformed all the seven purls (abodes of gods), and has found that only the state of equipoise is the real abode of truth.

lines.gurmukhi: sqy rohix sq vwr swDy PiV PiV mQy vwlw
lines.transliteration_english: Satay Rohani Sat Vaar Saadhay Dharhi Dharhi Maday Vaalaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: All the major nakstrs such as Sva-ti etc, and the seven days, he has controlled by holding them from their heads i.e. he has gone beyond their deceptions.

lines.gurmukhi: qRY sqy bHmMif kir vIh iekIh aulMiG suKwlw
lines.transliteration_english: Trai Satay Brahamandi Kari Veeh Ikeeh Ulaghi Soukhaalaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Twenty-one cities and their ostentations he has crossed and he lives happily (in his self).

lines.gurmukhi: sqy sur BrpUru kir sqI DwrI pwir ipAwlw
lines.transliteration_english: Satay Sur Bharapooru Kari Satee Dhaaree Paari Piaalaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He has known the comprehensiveness of the seven melodies (of music) and he has crossed the seven streams of the mountains.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq gur sbd smwlw ]8]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Gur Sabad Samaalaa ?8?

Shabad OS B.translation: This could be possible because he has sustained and accomplished the Word of the Guru in the holy congregation.

lines.gurmukhi: 9 mnvs, swD sMg-A`T igxqI

Shabad OS B.translation: Association with the saints  the count of eight,  -

lines.gurmukhi: ATKMif pwKMf miq gurmiq iek min iek iDAwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Atd Khandi Paakhand Mati Guramati Ik Mani Ik Dhiaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The person conducting in accordance with the wisdom of the Guru, goes beyond the hypocrisies of eight division (of four varnas and four ashramas) and adores the Lord with single minded devotion.

lines.gurmukhi: AstDwqu pwrs imlI gurmuiK kMcnu joiq jgwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Asat Dhaatu Paaras Milee Guramoukhi Kanchanu Joti Jagaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Eight metals in the form of four vamas and four religions having met the philosopher's stone in the form of Guru have convereted themselves into gold, the gurmukh, the enlightened one.

lines.gurmukhi: iriD isiD isD swiDkwN Awid purK Awdysu krwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Ridhi Sidhi Sidh Saadhikaan Aadi Purakh Aadaysu Karaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The siddhs and other miraculous practitioners have saluted to that primal Lord alone.

lines.gurmukhi: ATy phr ArwDIAY sbd suriq ilv AlKu lKwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Atdai Pahar Araadheeai Sabad Surati Liv Alakhu Lakhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: That Lord ought to be adored all the eight watches of time; by merger of the consciousness in the Word, the imperceptible is perceived.

lines.gurmukhi: Ast kulI ivhu auqrI siqgur miq n mohy mwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Asat Kulee Vihu Outaree Satigur Mati N Mohay Maaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: By adopting the advice of the true Gum, the poison (stigma) of the eight generations is wiped out and now the intellect does not get deluded due to maya.

lines.gurmukhi: mnu AswDu n swDIAY gurmuiK suKPlu swiD sDwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Manu Asaadhu N Saadheeai Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Saadhi Sadhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The gurmukhs by their loving devotion have refined the incorrigible mind.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq imil mn vis AwieAw ]9]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Mili Man Vasi Aaiaa ?9?

Shabad OS B.translation: The mind is controlled only by meeting the holy congregation.

lines.gurmukhi: 10 gurmiq swD sMg-nON igxqI

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmat, association with saint  the count of nine  -

lines.gurmukhi: nau prkwrI Bgiq kir swDY nvY duAwr gurmqI
lines.transliteration_english: Nau Parakaaree Bhagati Kari Saadhai Navai Duaar Guramatee.

Shabad OS B.translation: People adopt ninefold devotion but the gurmukh while adopting the wisdom of Guru accomplishes the nine doors.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK iprmu cKwieAw gwvY jIB rswieix rqI
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Piramu Chakhaaiaa Gaavai Jeebh Rasaaini Ratee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Tasting the joy of love, the Gurmukh with full attachment, recites the praises of the Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: nvI KMfI jwxwieAw rwju jogu ijix sqI AsqI
lines.transliteration_english: Navee Khandee Jaanaaiaa Raaju Jog Jini Satee Asatee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Through Rajyoga, the gurmukh has conquered both the truth and the falsehood and thus he is known all over the nine regions of the earth.

lines.gurmukhi: nau kir nau Gr swiDAw vrqmwn prlau auqpqI
lines.transliteration_english: Nau Kari Nau Ghar Saadhiaa Varatamaan Paralau Outapatee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Becoming humble he has disciplined the nine doors and besides he has diffused himself in creation and dissolution.

lines.gurmukhi: nv inDI ipC lgxI nwQ AnwQ snwQ jugqI
lines.transliteration_english: Nav Nidhi Pichhalaganee Naad Anaad Sanaad Jougatee.

Shabad OS B.translation: The nine treasures follow him earnestly and the gurmukh unfolds to the nine naths, the technique of getting liberated.

lines.gurmukhi: nau auKl ivic auKlI imTI kauVI TMFI qqI
lines.transliteration_english: Nau Oukhal Vichi Oukhalee Mitdee Kaurhee Tdaddhee Tatee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Among the nine sockets (in the humanbody), the tongue which was bitter, sweet, hot and cool, now

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq gurmiq sxKqI ]10]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadh Sangati Guramati Sanakhatee ?10?

Shabad OS B.translation: Due to the association with the holy congregation and the wisdom of Guru, has become blest and full of delights.

lines.gurmukhi: 11 isK kIh kry swD sMg

Shabad OS B.translation: What a Sikh ought to do  ?

lines.gurmukhi: dyiK prweIAw cMgIAw mwvwN BYxwN DIAwN jwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Daykhi Paraaeeaan Changeeaan Maavaan Bhainaan Dheeaan Jaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Sikh ought to treat beautiful women of others as his mothers, sisters, and daughters.

lines.gurmukhi: ausu sUAru ausu gwie hY pr Dn ihMdU muslmwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Ousu Sooaru Ousu Gaai Hai Par Dhan Hindoo Mousalamaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Others' wealth for him is as beef for Hindu and pork for a Muslim.

lines.gurmukhi: puqR klqR kutMbu dyiK mohy moih n Doih iD|wxY
lines.transliteration_english: Poutr Kalatr Koutanbu Daykhi Mohay Mohi N Dhohi Dhiaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Out of infatuation for his son, wife or family, he should not betray and deceive anyone.

lines.gurmukhi: ausqiq inMdw kMin suix Awphu burw n AwiK vKwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Ousatati Nidaa Kanni Souni Aapahu Buraa N Aakhi Vakhaanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: While listening to the praises and slander of others, he should not talk ill of anybody.

lines.gurmukhi: vf prqwpu n Awpu gix kir AhMmyau n iksY r\\\\wxY
lines.transliteration_english: Vad Parataapu N Aapu Gani Kari Ahanmayu N Kisai Raanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Neither he should count himself as great and glorious nor should he out of his ego, snub anybody.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suKPl pwieAw rwju jogu rs rlIAw mwxY
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phal Paaiaa Raaju Jogu Ras Raleeaa Maanai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukh of such a nature practises Raj yoga (the highest yoga), lives peacefully a

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq ivthu kurbwxY ]11]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Vitahu Kurabaanai ?11?

Shabad OS B.translation: And goes to sacrifice his self unto the holy congregation.

lines.gurmukhi: 12 gurmuK dI AvsQw

Shabad OS B.translation: The state of a Gurmukh

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK iprm cKwieAw BuK n Kwxu pIAxu AMnu pwxI
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Piramu Chakhaaiaa Bhoukh N Khaanu Peeanu Annu Paanee.

Shabad OS B.translation: The gurmukh having tasted the joy of love feels no desire for food and ink.

lines.gurmukhi: sbd suriq nINd auGVI jwgidAwN suK rYix ivhwxI
lines.transliteration_english: Sabad Surati Neend Ougharhee Jaagadiaan Soukh Raini Vihaanee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Due to the merger of his consciousness in the Word, he gets no eep and by getting awake, he spends his night delightfully.

lines.gurmukhi: swhy bDy sohdy mYlwpV prvwxu prwxI
lines.transliteration_english: Saahay Badhay Sohaday Mailaaparh Paravaanu Paraanee.

Shabad OS B.translation: As for a few ays before marriage, the bride and the bridegroom look beautiful even in gs, the gurmukhs also remain adorned.

lines.gurmukhi: clxu jwix sujwx hoie jg imhmwn Awey imhmwxI
lines.transliteration_english: Chalanu Jaani Sujaan Hoi Jag Mihamaan Aaay Mihamaanee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Since they understand the mystery f going from the world, they live like guests in the world (who must sooner r later go).

lines.gurmukhi: scu vxij Kyp lY cly gurmuiK gwfI rwhu nIswxI
lines.transliteration_english: Sachu Vanaji Khayp Lai Chalay Guramoukhi Gaadee Raahu Neesaanee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Being familiar with the highway of the wisdom of the Guru, Gurmukhs move on it with full load of the truthful merchandise.

lines.gurmukhi: hliq pliq muK aujly gur isK gurisKwN min BwxI
lines.transliteration_english: Halati Palati Moukh Ujalay Gur Sikh Gurasikhaan Mani Bhaanee.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Sikhs ove the teachings of the Guru and their faces remain bright in this and in the world hereafter.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq ivic AkQ khwxI ]12]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Vichi Akad Kahaanee ?12?

Shabad OS B.translation: Always in the holy congregation, the ineffable story of the grandeur of) the Lord is told.

lines.gurmukhi: 13 is`KI swDn, swDsMg

Shabad OS B.translation: Accept the will of the Lord in the holy congregation ,

lines.gurmukhi: haumY grbu invwrIAY gurmuiK irdY grIbI AwvY
lines.transliteration_english: Haoumai Garabu Nivaareeai Guramoukhi Ridai Gareebee Aavai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Repudiating pride and ego a gurmukh should be humble.

lines.gurmukhi: igAwn mqI Git cwnxw Brm AigAwnu AMDyru imtwvY
lines.transliteration_english: Giaan Matee Ghati Chaananaa Bharam Agiaanu Andhayru Mitaavai.

Shabad OS B.translation: With the light of knowledge in his mind he should dispel darkness of ignorance and delusions.

lines.gurmukhi: hoie inmwxw Fih pvY drgh mwxu inmwxw pwvY
lines.transliteration_english: Hoi Nimaanaa Ddhahi Pavai Daragah Maanu Nimaanaa Paavai.

Shabad OS B.translation: He should fall on the feet (of Lord) in humility because only the humble are honoured in the court of the Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: KsmY soeI Bwvdw KsmY dw ijsu Bwxw BwvY
lines.transliteration_english: Khasamai Soee Bhaanvadaa Khasamai Daa Jisu Bhaanaa Bhaavai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Master also loves that man who loves the will of the master.

lines.gurmukhi: Bwxw mMnY mMnIAY Awpxw Bwxw Awip mnwvY
lines.transliteration_english: Bhaanaa Mannai Manneeai Aapanaa Bhaanaa Aapi Manaavai.

Shabad OS B.translation: One who accepts the will of God is accepted by one understands that he is a guest in this world;

lines.gurmukhi: dunIAw ivic prwhuxw dwvw Cif rhY lw dwvY
lines.transliteration_english: Douneeaa Vichi Paraahounaa Daavaa Chhadi Rahai Laa Daavai.

Shabad OS B.translation: That is why foregoing all claims, he lives without making any claim for himself.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq imil hukim kmwvY ]13]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Mili Houkami Kamaavai ?13?

Shabad OS B.translation: Being in the holy congregation, he acts in consonance with the commands of the Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: 14 gurmuK kwr, swD sMg

Shabad OS B.translation: Only one Lord adored in the holy congregation ,

lines.gurmukhi: guru prmysru ieku jwix gurmuiK dUjw Bwau imtwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Guru Paramaysaru Iku Jaani Guramoukhi Doojaa Bhaau Mitaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Accepting Guru and God as one, the gurmukh has erased the sense of duality.

lines.gurmukhi: haumY pwil FhwiekY qwl ndI dw nIru imlwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Haoumai Paali Ddhahaai Kai Taal Nadee Daa Neeru Milaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Knocking down the wall of ego, the gurmukh has united the pond (self) with the  river (Brahm).

lines.gurmukhi: ndI iknwrY duh vlI iekdU pwrwvwru n pwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Nadee Kinaarai Duh Valee Ik Doo Paaraavaaru N Paaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Undoubtedly the river remains contained within its two banks neither one knowing the other.

lines.gurmukhi: ruKhu Plu qY Plhu ruKu ieku nwau Plu ruKu sdwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Roukhahu Phalu Tai Phalahu Roukhu Iku Naau Phalu Roukhu Sadaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: From tree the fruit and from fruit the e are born and in fact both are one though they have different names.

lines.gurmukhi: iCA ruqI ieku suJ hY suJY suJu n horu idKwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Chhia Routee Iku Sujh Hai Sujhai Sujhu N Horu Dikhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The sun is one in all the six seasons; knowing this, one does not think of different suns.

lines.gurmukhi: rwqIN qwry cmkdy idh ciVAY ikin AwKu lukwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Raateen Taaray Chamakaday Dih Charhiai Kini Aakhu Loukaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: At night the stars twinkle but with the break of day under whose command they hide themselves? (they automatically go and likewise with light of knowledge the darkness of ignorance is dispelled of its own).

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq iek min ieku iDAwieAw ]14]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Ik Mani Iku Dhiaaiaa ?14?

Shabad OS B.translation: The holy congregation, the gurmukhs adore the Lord with single-minded devotion.

lines.gurmukhi: 15 AslI Xog, swD sMg

Shabad OS B.translation: Gursikh a yogi ,

lines.gurmukhi: gurisK jogI jwgdy mwieAw AMdir krin audwsI
lines.transliteration_english: Gurasikh Jogee Jaagaday Maaiaa Andari Karani Udaasee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Yogi Sikhs of the Guru are ever awake and remain detached amidst maya.

lines.gurmukhi: kMnI muMdrwN mMqR gur sMqwN DUiV ibBUq su lwsI
lines.transliteration_english: Kanneen Moundaraan Mantr Gur Santaan Dhoorhi Bibhoot Su Laasee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurumantr for them is the earring and the dust of the feet of saints is ashes for them.

lines.gurmukhi: iKMQw iKmwN hMFwvxI pRym pqR Bwau Bugiq iblwsI
lines.transliteration_english: Khindaa Khimaa Handdhaavanee Praym Patr Bhaau Bhougati Bilaasee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Forgiveness is their patched blanket, love their begging bowl and devotion is their trumpet (sitig),

lines.gurmukhi: sbd suriq isM|I vjY fMfw igAwnu iDAwnu gurdwsI
lines.transliteration_english: Sabad Surati Sinee Vajai Dandaa Giaanu Dhiaanu Gur Daasee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Knowledge is their staff, and obedience to the Guru is their meditation.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq gur guPY bih shij smwiD AgwiD invwsI
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Gur Gudhai Bahi Sahaji Samaadhi Agaadhi Nivaasee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Sitting in the cave in the form of holy congregation, they reside in unfathomable equipoise.

lines.gurmukhi: haumY rog Arog hoie kir sMjog ivjog KlwsI
lines.transliteration_english: Haoumai Rog Arog Hoi Kari Sanjogu Vijog Khalaasee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Getting cured of the ailment of ego, they are liberated from the bonds of comings and goings (birth and death).

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq gurmiq swbwsI ]15]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Guramati Saabaasee ?15?

Shabad OS B.translation: Holy congregation is applauded because of the wisdom of the Guru that resides in it.

lines.gurmukhi: 16 AwSk hovy, swD sMg

Shabad OS B.translation: See yourself as lover of the holy congregation ,

lines.gurmukhi: lK bHmy lK vyd piV nyq nyq kir kir sB Qky
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Brahamay Lakh Vayd Parhi Nayt Nayt Kari Kari Sabh Dakay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of Brahmas, reciting millions of Vedas got tired saying nett nett )(this is not, this is not).

lines.gurmukhi: mhwdyv AvDUq lK jog iDAwn auxIdY Aky
lines.transliteration_english: Mahaadayv Avadhoot Lakh Jog Dhiaan Ouneedai Akay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Mahadev and millions of recluses are also fed up with sleeplessness of yogic practice.

lines.gurmukhi: lK ibsn Avqwr lY igAwn KVgu PiV phuic n sky
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Bisan Avataar Lai Giaan Kharhagu Dharhi Pahouchi N Sakay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Becoming millions of incarnations, Visnu even catching hold of the double edged sword of knowledge could not reach Him.

lines.gurmukhi: lK lomsu icr jIvxy Awid AMiq ivic DIrk Dky
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Lomasu Chir Jeevanay Aadi Anti Vichi Dheerak Dhakay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of long lived rishi such as Lomas despite their fortitude are, ultimately jostled about.

lines.gurmukhi: iqin loA jug cwir kir lK bHmMf KMf kr Fky
lines.transliteration_english: Tini Loa Joug Chaari Kari Lakh Brahamand Khand Kar Ddhakay.

Shabad OS B.translation: That Lord has covered with His 'self, all the three worlds, four ages, millions of universes and their divisions, i.e.

lines.gurmukhi: lK prlau auqpiq lK hrht mwlw AiK Prky
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Paralau Outapati Lakh Harahat Maalaa Akhi Dharakay.

Shabad OS B.translation: He is bigger than these all. Millions of creations and dissolutions go on moving like the chain of pots on persian wheel and all this is enacted  within the time of the fall of an eyelid.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq Awsku hoie qky ]16]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Aasaku Hoi Takay ?6?

Shabad OS B.translation: If someone becomes lover of the ,holy congregation, only then he can understand this mystery

lines.gurmukhi: 17 mn ijq, Awp ijq, swD sMg

Shabad OS B.translation: The world is conquered only by conquering the mind ,  ,

lines.gurmukhi: pwrbHmu pUrn bHmu Awid purKu hY siqgur soeI
lines.transliteration_english: Paarabraham Pooran Braham Aadi Purakh Hai Satiguru Soee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Transcendental Brahm is the perfect Brahm; He is the primal cosmic spirit (purakh) and the true Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: jog iDAwnu hYrwnu hoie vyd igAwn prvwh n hoeI
lines.transliteration_english: Jog Dhiaan Hairaanu Hoi Vayd Giaan Paravaah N Hoee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Yogis became awestruck in meditation for He does not care for knowledge of the Vedas.

lines.gurmukhi: dyvI dyv sryvdy jl Ql mhIAl BvdI loeI
lines.transliteration_english: Dayvee Dayv Sarayvaday Jal Dal Maheeal Bhavaday Loee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Adoring the gods and goddesses, people go on roaming (in different lives) in water on earth and in the sky.

lines.gurmukhi: hom jg jp qp Gxy kir kir krm Drm duK roeI
lines.transliteration_english: Hom Jag Jap Tap Ghanay Kari Kari Karam Dharam Doukh Roee.

Shabad OS B.translation: They perform many burnt offerings, oblations and ascetic disciplines and still weep while performing the so-called ritualistic activities (because their sufferings are not removed).

lines.gurmukhi: vis n AwvY Dwvdw ATu KMif pwKMf ivgoeI
lines.transliteration_english: Vasi N Aavai Dhaanvadaa Atdu Khandi Paakhand Vigoee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Ever-running mind does not come under control and the mind has spoiled all the eight divisions of life (four varnas and four ashrams).

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK mnu ijix jgu ijxY Awpu gvwie Awpy sB koeI
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Manu Jini Jagu Jinai Aapu Gavaai Aapay Sabh Koee.

Shabad OS B.translation: The gurmukhs after conquering the mind have won the whole world and losing their ego, they have seen themselves in one and all.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq gux hwru proeI ]17]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Goun Haaru Paroee ?17?

Shabad OS B.translation: The gurmukhs have prepared the garland of virtues in the holy congregation.

lines.gurmukhi: 18 gurU mlwh, swD sMg

Shabad OS B.translation: Guru, the boat man and association with the saints ,

lines.gurmukhi: AlK inrMjnu AwKIAY rUp n ryK AlyK Apwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Alakh Niranjanu Aakheeai Roop N Raykh Alaykh Apaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The imperceptible and blemishless Lord is said to be beyond all the forms and writs.

lines.gurmukhi: Aibgiq giq Aibgiq GxI ismrix syK n AwvY vwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Abigati Gati Abigati Ghanee Simarani Saykh N Aavai Vaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The nature of that unmanifest Lord is also deeply unmanifest, and in spite of continuous recitations by Sesanffg His mystery could not be understood.

lines.gurmukhi: AkQ kQw ikauN jwxIAY koie n AwiK suxwvxhwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Akad Kadaa Kiu Jaaneeai Koi N Aakhi Sounaavanahaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: How can His ineffable story be known because none is there to tell it.

lines.gurmukhi: Acrju no Awcrju hoie ivsmwdY ivsmwdu sumwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Acharaju No Aacharaju Hoi Visamaadai Visamaadu Soumaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Thinking about Him, the wonder also feels itself full of wonder and the awe also becomes awe struck.

lines.gurmukhi: cwir vrn guru isK hoie Gr bwrI bhu vxj vpwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Chaari Varan Guru Sikh Hoi Ghar Baaree Bahu Vanaj Vapaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Becoming the Sikh of the Guru the people of all the four varnas leading the household life,

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq AwrwiDAw Bgiq vClu guru rUpu murwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Aaraadhiaa Bhagati Vachhalu Guru Roopu Muraaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Have undertaken to perform various types of business and trade.

lines.gurmukhi: Bv swgru guir swgr qwrw ]18]
lines.transliteration_english: Bhav Saagaru Guri Saagar Taaraa ?18?

Shabad OS B.translation: In the holy congregations, they adore the Guru-God, affectionate towards the devotees, and the Guru gets them go across the world-ocean.

lines.gurmukhi: 19 gurU nUM soJI pweI

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukh attains the wisdom of understanding

lines.gurmukhi: inrMkwru eykMkwru hoie EAMkwir Akwru Apwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Nirankaaru Aykankaaru Hoi Aoankaari Akaaru Apaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The formless Lord assuming the form of ekarikcir created myriad names and forms out of Oankar.

lines.gurmukhi: rom rom ivic riKEnu kir bHmMf kroiV pswrw
lines.transliteration_english: Rom Rom Vichi Rakhiaonu Kari Brahamand Karorhi Pasaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: In His each trichome He has kept the expanse of crores of universes.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw jug vriqAw Agm Agocr DuMDUkwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Joug Varatiaa Agam Agocharu Dhoundhookaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: None knows for how many yugs, ages, there was imperceptible and impenetrable mist.

lines.gurmukhi: kyqiVAw jug vriqAw kir kir kyqiVAw Avqwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kaytarhiaan Joug Varatiaa Kari Kari Kaytarhiaan Avataaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: For many ages continued the activities of many an incarnation (of God).

lines.gurmukhi: Bgiq vClu hoie AwieAw klIkwl prgt pwhwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Bhagati Vachhalu Hoi Aaiaa Kalee Kaal Paragat Paahaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The same God, for the sake of his love for the devotees, has appeared in Kalijug (in the form of Guru).

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq vsgiq hoAw Eiq poiq kir iprm ipAwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Vasagati Hoaa Aoti Poti Kari Piram Piaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Being like warp and weft and the lover and the beloved one He, controlled by the holy congregation, resides there in.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suJY isrjxwhwrw ]19]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Sujhai Sirajanahaaraa ?19?

Shabad OS B.translation: Only gurmukh possesses the knowledge of that creator Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: 20 siqgur qy is`K, swD sMg

Shabad OS B.translation: The true Guru and the Sikh, association with the saints)  ,

lines.gurmukhi: siqgur mUriq prgtI gurmuiK suK Plu sbd ivcwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Satigur Moorati Paragatee Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Sabad Vichaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: With the emergence of the true Guru, the gurmukhs got the pleasure fruit of the pondering upon the Word.

lines.gurmukhi: iekdU hoie shs Plu guru isK swDsMgiq EAMkwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Ikadoo Hoi Sahas Phalu Guru Sikh Saadh Sangati Aoankaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: From that one Oankar, thousands of fruits emerged in the form of Gum, Sikh, and holy congregation.

lines.gurmukhi: ifTw suixAw mMinAw snmuiK sy ivrly sYswrw
lines.transliteration_english: Ditdaa Souniaa Manniaa Sanamoukhi Say Viralay Saisaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Rare are the Gurmukhs who being face to face with the Guru have seen him, listened to him and have obeyed his commands.

lines.gurmukhi: pihlo dy pwKwk hoie ipChu jgu mMgY pg Cwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Pahilo Day Paa Khaak Hoi Pichhahu Jagu Mangai Pag Chhaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: First, they become the dust of the feet of the Guru and later on, the whole world desires the dust of their feet.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK mwrgu cilAw scu vxju kir pwir auqwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Maaragu Chaliaa Sachu Vanaju Kari Paari Outaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Treading the path of Gurmukhs and transacting in truth, one goes across (the world ocean).

lines.gurmukhi: kImiq koie n jwxeI AwKix suxin n ilKixhwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Keemati Koi N Jaanaee Aakhani Sounani N Likhanihaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: None knows the glory of such persons nor can it be written, listened to and talked about.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq gur sbdu ipAwrw ]20]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Gur Sabadu Piaaraa ?20?

Shabad OS B.translation: In the holy congregation, only the word of the Guru, is loved.

lines.gurmukhi: 21 gur cyly dw myl

Shabad OS B.translation: Union of Guru and disciple

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq guru sbd ilv gurmuiK suKPlu iprm cKwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Guru Sabad Liv Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Piramu Chakhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: After merging their consciousness in the word of the Guru and the holy congregation, the gutmukhs have tasted the pleasure fruit in the form of contemplation of the Sabad.

lines.gurmukhi: sB inDwn kurbwn kir sBy Pl bilhwr krwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Sabh Nidhaan Kurabaan Kari Sabhay Phal Balihaar Karaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: For this fruit, they have offered all the treasures and other fruits also have been sacrificed for the same.

lines.gurmukhi: qiRsnw jlix buJweIAwN swNiq shj sMqoKu idVwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Trisanaa Jalani Bujhaaeeaan Saanti Sahaj Santokhu Dirhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: This fruit has quenched all desires and fires and has further firmed up the feeling of peace, equipoise and contentment.

lines.gurmukhi: sBy Awsw pUrIAw Awsw ivic inrwsu vlwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Sabhay Aasaa Pooreeaa Aasaa Vichi Niraasu Valaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: All the hopes have been fulfilled and now the feeling of detachment towards them has come up.

lines.gurmukhi: mnsw mnih smwielY mn kwmn inhkwm n DwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Manasaa Manahi Samaai Lai Man Kaaman Nihakaam N Dhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The waves of mind have been subsumed in the mind itself and mind now having become free of desires does not run in any direction.

lines.gurmukhi: krm kwl jmjwl kit krm kry inhkrm rhwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Karam Kaal Jam Jaal Kati Karam Karay Nihakaram Rahaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Cutting asunder the rituals and the noose of death, the mind while becoming active has become free of desires for reward.

lines.gurmukhi: gur aupdysu Avysu kir pYrI pY jgu pYrI pwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Gur Oupadays Avaysu Kari Pairee Pai Jagu Pairee Paaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Getting inspired by the teachings of the Guru, first, the gurmukh fell on the feet of the Guru and then he made the whole world fall cn his feet.

lines.gurmukhi: gur cyly prcw prcwieAw ]21]29]
lines.transliteration_english: Gur Chaylay Parachaa Parachaaiaa ?21?29?ounateeha?

Shabad OS B.translation: This way, being with the Guru, the disciple has identified Love.

lines.gurmukhi: <> siqgur pRswid ]
lines.transliteration_english: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi ?

Shabad OS B.translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

lines.gurmukhi: sbd suriq ilv gurisK sMD imly pMc prpMc imty pMc prDwny hY
lines.transliteration_english: Sabad Surati Liv Gursikh Sandh Milay , Panch Parapanch Mitay Panch Paradhaanay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: With the meeting of Guru and Sikh, and engrossment of the latter in the divine word, he is able to counter the deceit of five vices-kam, krodh, lobh, moh and ahankar. The five virtues of Truth, Contentment, Compassion, Devotion and Patience become paramou

lines.gurmukhi: BwgY BY Brm Byd kwl Aau krm Kyd log byd aulMiG audoq gur igAwny hY
lines.transliteration_english: Bhaagai Bhai Bharam Bhayd Kaal Au Karam Khayda , Log Bayd Ulanghi Udot Gur Giaanay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: All his doubts, fear and discriminatory feelings are destroyed. He is not hunted by the worldly discomforts those accrue from worldly activities.

lines.gurmukhi: mwieAw Aau bHm sm dsm duAwr pwir Anhd runJun bwjq nIswny hY
lines.transliteration_english: Maaiaa Au Braham Sam Dasam Duaar Paari , Anahad Rounajhoun Baajat Neesaanay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: With his conscious awareness firmly lodged in the mystical tenth opening, the worldly attractions and Lord appears alike to him. He sees the image of the Lord in every creature of the world. And in such a state, he remains engrossed in the celestial music

lines.gurmukhi: aunmn mgn ggn jgmg joiq inJr Apwr Dwr prm inDwny hY ]29]
lines.transliteration_english: Ounaman Magan Gagan Jagamag Joti , Nijhar Apaar Dhaar Param Nidhaanay Hai ?29?

Shabad OS B.translation: In such a high spiritual state, he enjoys heavenly bliss and the divine light shines in him. He is ever relishing the divine elixir of Naam. (29)
